title: Baldur's Gate 3's voice actors can't get enough of their characters either, and have started making them playlists for our enjoyment

description: Keep those adorable little bumbleheaded blobs alive, folks.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 players surprised to discover that, due to Elf shenanigans, Shadowheart is actually over 40 years old
description: A good skincare regimen and the ancient legacy of the Fey will do wonders for you.

title: Warhammer: The Old World will be out next year
description: The tabletop wargame is returning to its original setting.

title: Monster Train dev cuts all the monetization from its tactical battler, Inkbound
description: No more battle pass, no more cosmetic purchasing.

title: I'm kinda liking this badly translated action roguelike where you can wield an extra gun with your butt
description: Apocalypse Party is a solo or co-op action roguelike starring some familiar faces.

title: If you scream while playing Don't Scream you have to restart the game

description: "We do have free DLCs drops coming," Lake said.

title: Next city-builder from the creator of The Settlers is looking pretty good in a new demo
description: Pioneers of Pagonia intends to be a beautiful, easy to play city builder with optional cooperative play.
